title: English Quiz - Medium Difficulty
description: This quiz will test your knowledge of English grammar, vocabulary, and usage.

items.question: Which of the following sentences is grammatically correct?
choices: I was going to the store when I saw him.
I went to the store when I saw him.
I had gone to the store when I saw him.
items.answer: I was going to the store when I saw him.

items.question: What is the past tense of the verb 'eat'?
What is the future tense of the verb 'go'?
Which of the following words is a synonym for 'happy'?
Which of the following words is a synonym for 'big'?
Which of the following words is an antonym for 'hot'?
Which of the following sentences is grammatically correct?
choices: He gave the book to I.
He gave the book to me.

items.question: Which of the following sentences is grammatically correct?
choices: I seen the movie last night.
I saw the movie last night.
I seed the movie last night.
items.answer: I saw the movie last night.

items.question: Which of the following sentences is grammatically correct?
choices: There's two books on the table.
There's two books on the table.
There are two books on the table.
items.answer: There are two books on the table.
